Name: Curiositytraveller
Title: Hare Krishna
Review: It is nice temple located next to city palace. We went there during in morning when prayers were going on. It is very spiritual.

Name: Sanjay Malhotra
Title: Govind Dev ji Temple
Review: This is one of the ancient temples of Jaipur where the Royal families use to worship. The temple is adjacent to the City Palace from where the royal family has the direct access from the palace. The devotees visit the temple for the blessings.

Name: Akshay
Title: Very famous temple of Jaipur
Review: One of the famous temple of Jaipur and of ancient time. It is a wonderful devotional place ..lot of devotees r visiting daily. But very calm and peace feeling.

Name: Vineet Pareek
Title: Fag utsav
Review: Visited first day of fag utsav, beautiful rachna jhanki, amezing performance given by artists.... jaipur gharana kathak...Gulabo Kalbelia dancer,

Name: mheitner
Title: Visit during prayers
Review: The spiritual energy during prayers was quite amazing.It was easy to store shoes nearby to enter the temple.

Name: Pintya
Title: Devotion and peace
Review: This is krishna bhagwan temple. It is well maintained and decorated. All the devotees can be seen totally devoted in pooja and aarti.

Name: hitesh1304
Title: Sri Govind Ji Temple...Grand old Krishna Temple..Spiritual and Blissful experience
Review: Visited GovindJi temple on 2/2/20 ..Its in the johari bazar area of old jaipur, A religious and holy place , with a vast temple area below the hills,a magnificent idol of Shri Krishnaji , indeed a temple with lots of positive energy and high on spiritual relevance.The prayers,chanting and the aartis are worth a watch and full of vibrationsA must visit place while in Jaipur

Name: kishoreviriiyala
Title: Place of tranquil
Review: The place is held very high in religious circles... Has the old charm of royalty... the thin lanes of erstwhile era... the line of shops selling items required for the spiritual journey...All lead to the main temple... which is the abode of lord Krishna.. one sight of Him and u forget all other materialistic links.. its an instant connect with the lord... An experience which can't be explained, which can't be expressed, which can only be felt...

Name: Shobha
Title: Well maintained
Review: Temple is well maintained and clean . Felt good inside the mandir . Can feel the presence of shri Krishna here . Will like to visit here again .

Name: juvlemm
Title: Well managed
Review: The temple is nice and clean. There are separate lanes for ladies and gents. Mandap is big capable of accomodating good crowd for aarti.

Name: Aniruddh
Title: Very peaceful
Review: the Darshan was very nice, and the Aarti of GOD gives a satisfied environment, where all devotees are so involved in pooja

Name: Vipin Arora
Title: Beautiful temple
Review: Sri Govind Devji temple is a beautiful , powerful temple full of divine grace and devotion in Jaipur . The Lord blesses the devotees with darasanas in a beautiful way .

Name: sara
Title: Spirtual Tour with Thriillophilia
Review: We had a great time on this spiritual tour organised by Thrillophilia. Learnt a lot about the Indian culture and spirituality and the temple was really beautiful. A well organised tour.

Name: ritu sharma
Title: Spiritual tour
Review: Jaipur is really a spiritual city, the temples are so beautiful & magnificent and seeing how people truly believe in god & how they express their believe. I was mesmerised & was so filled with joy. My family & I really enjoyed and are really grateful to thrillophilia for amazing arrangements. Taking a guide was really helpful and turned out to be the best decision. Would really love to visit again

Name: khamoshratien
Title: Aaradhya of Jaipur..
Review: If you visit Jaipur, must visit place isGovind Dev Ji tample.Nice place situated in the heart of Jaipur.City palace, jantar mantar, hawa Mahal all are in same area.Beautiful peace of art.Full of devotees..Music all over the premises..

Name: Sanjay Kumar
Title: Very excited to visiting here
Review: We were very excited to visit here and finally we planned to visit here and we visited here on 16 August 2019 and we prayed here for happy and healthy life for everyone.

Name: REVIEWS
Title: Peace.
Review: This is Krishna temple.hindu temple. Veryy famous Krishna temple in Jaipur. Free parking and shoe rack available there. Beautiful temple.

Name: Abhay Mehta
Title: The Lord of Jaipur City
Review: The idol of Radha Goving ji was brought to Jaipur from Vrindavan by the Jaipur king Raja Man Singh, who was his deity. The whole Jaipur is deity of Govind Dev ji and the chanting of bhajans in the campus makes the environment very pious and religious. One feels very calm and experience inner piece in the temple after Darshan.

Name: jayamrutiya4769
Title: holi place
Review: once we enterd in temple area we forgot every frustation. free parkinv and shoe rack available there approx 500 people praying at a time there.

Name: Dan_453
Title: Holy site!
Review: This famous Krishna temple is visited by hundreds of devotees everyday. An ancient hindu temple adjoining city palace the home and museum of royal family of Jaipur.

Name: Somya P
Title: Most peaceful place
Review: Govind Dev Temple is one of the very few places in Jaipur which will offer you complete peace. Just walking here makes you feel very light. All festival celebrations in the temple are must visit.

Name: arun sharma
Title: Nice place for worship
Review: Govind Devji Temple at Jaipur is a temple where one wants to go for prayer regularly. During darshan one gets piece of mind

Name: Swati Jethani
Title: Holi at Govind devji temple
Review: I went to celebrate Holi at Govind devji mandir. I visited 11 am to 12 pm jhanki which is a special on the occasion of Holi. This is year it is happening from 14th March to 20th March. We will celebrate gulal Holi on 20th March at Temple. It will include jhanki and Holi celebration with Govind devji. I have shared some pictures clicked during jhanki. Panditji was dressing up to good for Holi celebration then he sprinkled gulal and holy water on shradhalus.Pls follow my Instagram page for more beautiful pictures - photowalk_with_swati

Name: Manoj Agrawal
Title: One of best temples
Review: I have visited several temples across India but this one is really close to heart. Huge compound to accommodate thousands of people, very well organised shoe stands, drinking water, ongoing prayers and music, big gardens in backyard and temple location in centre of city. Darshan itself is beyond words to mention. I can recommend this place for people looking for dharmik place and to people who want local feel. Don’t miss laddoo Prasadam.

Name: rjpriyanka
Title: Krishna
Review: A krishna temple located inside the city papace and in the heart of city. Try out laddos here, superb.

Name: Nish0901
Title: Near City Palace
Review: Govind Devji Temple is dedicated to Lord Krishna. This temple can be covered with City Palace. This place becomes crowded during morning and evening aarti time. Nice place to go with family.

Name: Umang A
Title: Radhe radhe
Review: This is one of the most famous Krishna temple in India. Located in old jaipur. Legends says that the statue was crafted by grandson of Krishna himself

Name: Amolak Rattan K
Title: Very famous and revered temple of Jaipur
Review: You will really enjoy the Aarti in the evening. This is a very popular and revered temple and devotees come in a very large number. We really felt blessed.Governor Amolak Rattan Kohli

Name: Vimlesh Ranjan
Title: Nice place to go with family
Review: This place is amazing with traditional style for worshipping and must to go when you are in Jaipur. I have gone here many times.

Name: vishphoo2231
Title: Govind Devji Temple
Review: Govind Devji Temple holy temple ... really loved the temple has lots of peace and very beautiful temple it is

Name: Pravesh Goswami
Title: Spirituality at its best
Review: One of the most followed temples of Jaipur. Situated near city palace. Temple complex is huge. Quite neat & clean. Must visit, if you are in jaipur.

Name: Vivek K
Title: Jan 1 2019
Review: Its located in old Jaipur city , we took a Auto as suggested by Hotel coz place was too crowded due metro construction  , Holy place lot of devotees present , pls check Darshan timing before planning visit

Name: Rajagopal Subramanian
Title: Peaceful and pious worship place for Hindus
Review: Situated not far away from other famous tourists spots like Hawa Mahal, City Palace, etc. this temple is one of the important tourist attractions in Jaipur.

Name: SadhanaRakesh
Title: Most Famous Radha Krishna Temple for Divine Blessings
Review: While in Jaipur for attending a marriage function, our friends spoke to us about this famous temple of Jaipur and explained the divine blessings showered on devotees at this temple. They cited a few cases of their experience where their wishes were fulfilled by prayers here. We visited in the morning around 8:30 hrs when the Aarti was going on. We entered through Hawa Maha, walked a few meters, looked the palace on left side and reached the temple.  We were told that the Queen in the palace used to have a first look at the deity (in temple) from the palace each morning. The temple and the palace face each other. We removed our shoes in open area of the premises as people informed us that the shoes etc. are not stolen from here for fear of the Lord.A large number of devotees were there – more than 200 in numbers, but no chaoes! All were standing as one group and praying. The temple attracts huge number of devotees on all days for divine blessings of Lord Radha Krishna. Devotees throng the deity with full faith and devotion every day. The temple area is clean and very well maintained. While entering the Temple premises, we noticed on left corner some small structure on which was written “Masjid” in green colour.  How come such boards be hanged on a small building in Hindu Temple area? Is it a calculated game of anti social political people? For sure, it is going to create communal colors in future. State Government and administrative authorities must investigate and do the needful.

Name: Saheli Pal
Title: Nice temple near City Palace
Review: Govind Devji Temple is a very nice devotional Hindi temple located very near to City Palace of Jaipur. Govind devji is another name of Hindu lord Krishna and the temple is dedicated to him. The place is quite clean and well maintained.They are several different timing for seeing the idol of radha-krishna. If you want to see them you should check out the timing before going there. Otherwise the temple remain opens till 9 o clock at night.If you are in Jaipur we shouldn't miss visiting Govind Devji Temple.

Name: Himanshi_Saxena
Title: Well managed and serene temple
Review: It is quite an old temple dedicated to Lord Krishna. One should definitely keep the timings in mind as no darshan is possible from 12 pm to 5 pm. The temple is very well manged and one should definitely visit this temple.

Name: FrequentTripster
Title: Fascinating cultural experience
Review: A highlight of Jaipur that is not to be missed.  Make sure that you go for one of the scheduled services to fully experience the temple and the local worshipers

Name: Sally m
Title: Interesting
Review: Small but well worth the visit although it was extremely busy when we went.  Like all of these attractions you wont get the benefit or understand the reasons behind unless you have a guide, although to be honest I can't remember much even though we did have a guide. So much to take in. Like all of the attractions we visited I think we would have benefited from some form of "take away" leaflet or something we could take time digesting what we had seen as you have to keep moving because of the every flowing stream of visitors behind you.

Name: dipali
Title: Govind Devi Ji Temple
Review: One of the most famous temples in Jaipur and is a must place to visit . The Vigraha is the one that has come from Mathura and is been made by Shree Vajranabh the closest relative to Prabhu Shree Krishna . The temple offers amenities like the parking and also the golf cart for the elderlies . It has multiple gates to enter and the temple offers multiple Jhakees of Prabhu Shree Krishna. The first Jhakee is at 4:30 am called the Mangala Arti and the last is the shayan Arti that happens at 8:30pm . This is the third Vigraha in line with the other two 1. Madan mohan jee at karoli, 2. The Gopinath jee at Gopinath jee mandir thikana at Jaipur and the third is the Govinddev ji at Jaipur . There is a story that it is very shubh that one does the three durshan starting from the Madan mohan ji at karauli followed by Gopinath ji at Jaipur and the Radhe Govind dev ji at Jaipur between the sunrise and the sunset of any day . You will find atleast 300 people who lineup everyday for the darshan at Govind devji temple at the time of mangala and are regular and never miss any mangala of Shree Govind dev ji

Name: Arun L
Title: A very popular temple dedicated to Lord Krishna
Review: One has to preplan the visit as the temple only opens the curtains periodically, that too for a limited time.However once the 'Darshan' opens up, it is advisable to move on the left side of the temple to question for free close up darshan.

Name: vaida17
Title: GOVIND TEMPLE
Review: This temple is a beauty, with Lord Govind and Devi Radha as main deities.  The idols are very beautiful, and nicely decorated.  large crowd assemble to have darshan of lord during aarati, the evening at 17-30 hrs IST. The deities can be seen from the main hall without hinderances since placed at a higher level.  The temple area a very large, and can accommodate huge crowds.   it has also prasad distribution counters and foot ware keeping stalls. chanting of lords name is continuously heard from the devotees.  A must visit for krishna baktas

Name: Brendan W
Title: Jai Rada Govindaji
Review: Wonderful devotion to the lord. These deities are from 5000 years back. They were brought to Jaipur to escape the Muslim hordes who were destroying Hindu temples around 400 years back.   Great temple. Great devotion to the Lord.  Go there let your eyes fall upon there lordships and take the blessing and offer your heart. Jai Rada govindaji

Name: axbisw2
Title: Must Visit if you are a Krishna Lover
Review: This Temple has a history. So that's one thing which is fascinating about this temple which I would like you to explore on your own. From Vrindavan to Kanaka Vrindavan and then to this temple the journey is alluring, enchanting and then having the Chaitanya Mahaprabhu photographs all over the temple has made a remarkable impact to the overall visit. Must Visit if you are a Krishna Bhakta or a Vaishnavas.

Name: Vipin Arora
Title: Beautiful temple
Review: If you wish to experience the beauty of Vrindavan ,the abode of Sri Radha Krishna ,in Jaipur itself , you must head to Govind devji temple . Very well maintained with pure chantings of Krishna chants emanating every second , it's a devotees paradise . The deities are beautiful and very nicely decorated on pious occasions . Aartis too are great to watch .

Name: mathurshradha19
Title: Govind Devji Temple
Review: My experience of visiting Govind Devji temple over the last 20 years (being a native here):1. Follow temple timings from the website. Timings differ during summer and winter and special darshan timings are during Janmasthami.2. Lots of florist and puja item shops outside the temple. So no need to bring anything from home.3. Systematic entry and exit. Place to keep shoes in return for token. Do not keep shoes randomly anywhere as dogs and monkeys are in plenty here.4. For best darshan try to squeeze yourself for the front row. Camera is allowed!5. If you want to go inside the temple near the radha krishna, then talk to the pujari. Remember to dress in suit/saree if you want to go inside.6. Try to get tulsi and chandan offered to govind devjji. 7. If you want to conduct any special puja/darshan, talk to the puruhit and go in off season (not during bhadoo month/near janmasthami) due to crowd.8. Before the temple is a place where you can feed grass to cows. Also, you can feed pigeons. Considered pious deed to do so. All grains and grass available there itself.9. Separate counter for collecting prasad. 10. Near to the temple is City Palace and Jantar Mantar which are also good to visit. Just check timings, whicha re usually before 4pm. So plan trip accordingly. 11. Also, Hawa Mahal is walkable and so it JOhri Bazaar which are famous for shopping. 12. Just a few kms before is LMB Restaurant which is perhaps the oldest and safest place to relish traditional rajasthani food, jhewar, ladoo, phini and churma. Note: Parking is problematic. Take a cab/taxi to this place.

Name: rjpriyanka
Title: Devine !!
Review: One of the most famous temple of jaipur situated in city palace  .. it's believed that it's idol was sculptured by the great grand son of lord Krishna ...

Name: Puha P
Title: TThe Vaishnava temple Govind Dev Ji
Review: The Vaishnava temple Govind Dev Ji is situated in Jaipur!  It is located in the City Palace complex. Heavily adorned by myths and legends, the Temple, is a famed Hindu Pilgrim centre. The Temple is renowned for its ‘Mangala Aartis’ which take place every day. The mythical and calming aura the temple imparts in its devotees is mesmerizing.

Name: Krupali S
Title: old temple
Review: This is 18th century old temple where main lord is Krishna. It is popular among tourist as well local people. This is holy and peaceful place of lord krishna. A huge garden surrounding the temple. Do not miss the beautiful temple and prasad too.

Name: sofiachanel1
Title: must visiti temple
Review: so good energie and a must visit temple.best temple and so many people , see opening time mornings are good

Name: Stupid E
Title: Govind Devji Temple
Review: My closest friend took me here and I was blessed to come here. Here's the blessing of Govind Dev Ji who blessed me and you should go.

Name: neelanjana s
Title: Jaipur's Soul is in this temple
Review: when you visit Govinddev ji Temple, you are not just submitting to a God but to an atmosphere of peace. the gardens surrounding the temple and the view of Gadh Ganesh Temple is not only surreal but very heart Warming. There are two entrances to the temple. And also, For children there are swings and a park to play in. The architecture of the place gives you an immediate palatial feel.

Name: vmsatheesh22
Title: Good
Review: Govind devji temple, good and best atmosphere for relaxing and pray, a different type of temple compare with kerala

Name: AkhileshM9800
Title: Close to the Gods !
Review: A great place to visit to see the beauty of Lord Krishna. Visit during the aarti and feel at peace in the large hall with other devotees !!

Name: Hitesh S
Title: In search for holiness
Review: I was travelling in Jaipur and then came across this beautiful structure carved with stones and hard work.

Name: Amolak Rattan K
Title: Very revered Temple of Jaipur
Review: Jaipur people will always suggest you to visit this temple because local people have immense faith in this Daity . You come back with renewed confidence after your visit .Governor Amolak Rattan Kohli

Name: Anshul
Title: Very peaceful place, neat and maintained.
Review: Very peaceful place, neat and maintained.But at time of aarti there's a mess as there are lot of people.But you'll get a lot of positive vibes.There are a lot of kiosks to buy from and a lot of parking space.

Name: kamakshi2015
Title: The deity of the city !
Review: This temple a place you can find people dancing , singing here  in  ecstasy here at the time of arti . The people who are visitors and the regular local strong this tempke in morning and more in evening s . There are timings for the  arti . The deity of this city resides here . This tempke is old and was a regular temple for the jaipur royals when they ruled here . No dress code here . Beware of pick pockets .

Name: webetutorial
Title: good templae
Review: webetutorial team visit this place and found good and peaceful environment which remove the all stress from the mind.

Name: SameekshakSACHIN
Title: Sameeksha By Sachin - LargeTemple Complex
Review: I visited the temple with my family and attended the evening Aarti. When you enter the temple there are many Prasad Shops on the left and right side for taking Prasad to offer to Deity. After entering the main complex you will see shoe racks at your left hand side, when you move further there are Prasad windows on the left hand side and you can get Prasad on payment basis after the darshan for yourself. Shoe racks are available free of cost. There is nice arrangement for Prasad distribution and there are separate lines for male and female devotees for taking Prasad.  There is shaded line arrangement for Darshan also in case of rush in the temple. We felt blessed to have darshan in the temple. Must visit place, highly recommended.

Name: Smruti B
Title: Serene
Review: No words can explain the serenity of this temple.A must visitand if possible attend the aarti.The place is a little crowded to park your vehicle ut eventually u get space.

Name: 789skc
Title: Must Visit !!!!!
Review: If you're in Jaipur and if you love Lord Krishna,then must visit this place.This temple is belongs from Jaipur Royal family.Now a days this temple is open for every body.At Aarti time the place is filled by the devotees.The place is very well maintained by the trust

Name: Footprints727663
Title: Royal Temple
Review: I went to Govind Devji Temple. Govind Devji Temple Jaipur is believed to be the most royal temple on earth after Vrindavan, especially for supporters of Lord Krishna. The entire place expresses divine feeling and give peace and satisfaction to the soul of visitors. It is great place to go.

Name: He52
Title: Nice place ,must to visit here if you are in Jaipur ,govind Dev ji bless us all
Review: Awesome place to visit ,if you are in Jaipur ,then leave all first you visit this temple, very nice temple

Name: Abd
Title: Fine place
Review: I have visited this place for attending prasadi's of dal bati churma. You will always find people visiting this place in large numbers to seek religious pleasure & attain calmness. I agree to others that this place is actually divine & gives you a sense of calmness in its own way. You feel happy & relaxed after visiting this place.

Name: Deep C
Title: Beautiful and Holy
Review: Very beautiful.One must wait to watch the aarti at about 6pm. Very beautiful experience.Close darshan can be done in a cue in the mandir but it may take anywhere between 20 min to an hour.

Name: N. Shah
Title: Can visit if in the area
Review: It is not a magnanimous temple, but a nice one to visit if you are in and around the area. Lot of belief though.

Name: shweta m
Title: divine place
Review: It is a great place so divine and utterly beautiful. You will feel peaceful and relaxed. Enjoyed the place.

Name: Seatraveler2
Title: Lovely welcoming community
Review: This lovely Buddist temple was made lovelier by the warm welcome of its' faithful toward us tourist. Located only a few minutes walk from the City Palace, a visit is a great way to start the day in the 'pink city'.

Name: Abhishek G
Title: Dont miss in jaipur
Review: Peace of mind.The place I think compulsorily to visit in jaipur, is the temple of Govind devji The structure of temple is also worth watching. However evening Aarti is the thing I like most

Name: gmwallstreet
Title: peace of mind
Review: Great place of worship, lots of people coming regularly as per schedule of darshan.Beauty of this place is their stating Aarties, which always sing by people.They sing different Aarties or Bhajan at the time of be-gaining.

Name: Jitendra Singh
Title: Place for Peace
Review: This is the temple dedicated to Lord Krishna. Reugar Darshans are available of the lord from a distance. One is not allowed to touch the Lord. If you spend some time you really get peace of mind and eternal pleasure.

Name: cferey54
Title: MORNING WORSHIP WHEN FRIENDSHIP MEETS FAITH
Review: The 7.39 am darsh is very well known among the Jaipurites and gathers a lot of people in a friendly and authentic devotional moment

Name: FLworldwanderer
Title: Beautiful temple ....
Review: Govind Devji Temple, is located in the City Palace.  People from Jaipur, as well as the royal family, are devout worshipers here.  The temple is dedicated to Lord Govind Devji (known as Lord Krishna).  On special religious holidays and festivals, thousands of people will come to visit, taking part in prayer (Aarti).  Hope this helps with your first visit.

Name: HrideshSharma
Title: Again start of day with God
Review: It was not planned but in jaipur planned to visit small circuit around JantarMantar,  500 Mrs away is the Govinda (Lord Krisna ) temple. Nice clean there are caravan timings and in morning get close by 11:30 am

Name: alpha08
Title: divine place
Review: Located in centre of city named chardivari. Must see as this temple is famous for lord krishna and story associated with this idol

Name: Umang A
Title: Divine...
Review: Located in the heart of city. This temple is famous for the story associated with the idol. It is said the idol handmade by grandson of Krishna when Rukmaniji told him how Krishna used to look

Name: ranjanapathak
Title: A must in Jaipur
Review: Givind deo ji temple in Jaipur is a very old Pushti Margi temple. Lord Krishna and Radha are the main deity. Morning, and evening time thousands of Jaipurites and tourists can be seen here. You can stand in queue and  purchase Laddu Prasad, limited to 4 Laddus per person. There is a very large garden attached to this temple, and you can find many families having picnic here. Red face monkeys are in plenty and one has to take care from them.

Name: Aneesh S
Title: Hare Krishna
Review: This is a beautiful temple devoted to Lord Krishna situated within the city palace complex near the Hawa mahal and Jantar mantar.This is one of the most important temples besides Vrindavan for Krishna devotees.The temple opens multiple times during the day for arti (7 in total.starting at 4-30am) and rest of the times it is closed.

Name: KeswaniGaurav
Title: Radhe Radhe
Review: Visiting the Govind Devji temple is always the peaceful and calming experience. It brings in peace of mind. Very near to City Palace gates, A must visit during Aarti, if possible attend early morning aarti's.

Name: jonesharma29
Title: Govind deviji temple
Review: govind deviji temple is famous temple of jaipur.beautiful and well managed.temple is devoted to lord krishna and radha ji

Name: Sweta P
Title: Lovely
Review: Spectacular Murti or Lord Krishna and decorated in a brilliant way, very lovely experience to see this Temple.

Name: Thomas D
Title: Great experience
Review: Visiting the Govind Devji Temple dedicated to Lord Krishna was a very impressive experience also for a non-Hindu. Went there in the late evening.

Name: Sudha2410
Title: Good
Review: Went to Govinda Devji temple. When we entered the security at the entrance told that the temple would be closed soon and to hurry. It is some distance from the gate, so ran inside. Managed to see the aarti. Then the temple was closed for the afternoon. We were lucky to get the darshan.

Name: BHUPENDRA s
Title: govind devji mandir
Review: its near city palace dedicated to lord krishna where you can feel energetic an powerful an go in lap of god

Name: Kushagra
Title: Beautiful Radha Krishna Temple
Review: Govind Dev ji temle is quite old and very very popular among the locals. Though you can visit the temple anytime you want (during the temple hours) but early morning darshan/aarti is the best. This place is magical, soothing, refreshing and wonderful. Do visit .

Name: Mona C
Title: Darshan
Review: Amazing temple. A must visit for morning aarti when people come for the darshan of the lord and energize themselves.

Name: Kumkumjaipur
Title: Amazing temple
Review: Govind Devji temple is located behind the city palace and is actually the personal temple of the Maharaja.

Name: dave w
Title: a nice temple
Review: it is a nice temple. beautiful but in india we saw lots of temples that were stunning but got over so many.

Name: HOMPRS
Title: Very popular among locals
Review: The temple is just stone throw away from hawa mahal and is a very popular lord krishna temple after mathura. One must start their tour to jaipur with this temple. Hugely popular. Must must visit

Name: Ajitku
Title: Temple
Review: This is a temple. Here Lord govind get worshipping. It is a tourist attraction. The design of the temple is amazing

Name: AAA
Title: It's Great
Review: I had visited this temple with my friend. This is very big and magnificent temple. This is very peaceful place. I think you must definitely visit.

Name: darshcv
Title: A Royal temple
Review: Visited this temple in the morning with my family. The temple is quite a big place. It has a huge compound  and big Katha Mandap. The Idols of Krishna is cool.

Name: Sumana A
Title: Trip to Rajasthan
Review: Very nice temple. Tucked amidst the busy market place, this is a surprisingly very big temple, with a vast space for pilgrims to sit and pray. Very neat  and organized.

Name: Vidya Anil D
Title: Peaceful transcending end to the day
Review: I am from south India, and this temple was very different from the temples here. We went in the evening about 6 o clock, we walked from hawa mahal, after finishing up visiting it. But this temple is close to city Palace and jantar mantar. But since temple don't have time constraint, we went to hawa mahal after jantar mantr and then walked back to the temple.Visiting the temple is a good idea as after looking at the tourist attractions, in the evening you can visit the beautiful temple.We sat in the temple for a while, the atmosphere, chanting was mesmerizing. They close the curtains in front of the God at around 6:45. We walked around the temple there is lake behind and nice view of nargad fort(not entirely sure if it was jaigarh or nargadh). All in all nice end to out evening. We bought bead sheets outside the temple in the market complex, the quality was great it was priced at 1500 rupees, but we found other places selling it for much lesser, so you may want to look out for that.

Name: JD2807
Title: Excellent feeling at the time of Darshan of Govind Devji
Review: Out of the world feeling at the Govind Devji Temple. Huge devotees base in Jaipur. Daily 5 aarti's and each Aarti gives a different feeling

Name: pkaran
Title: Famous holy temple in Jaipur
Review: Govind Devji Temple is located in the City Palace and the royal family is a great devotee of this temple, so as hundreds of thousands of people of Jaipur. It is dedicated to Lord Govind Devji (Lord Krishna). The murti (idol) was bought from Vrindavan by Maharaja Sawal Jai Singh II. During festivals, the temple is heavily crowded as hundreds of thousands of people visit here. There is daily aarti (prayer) at different times in a day which is also specially attended by people. It is worth visiting this temple while in Jaipur.

Name: cbk2911
Title: Govindji temple - Landmark temple of Jaipur
Review: We visited this temple to take darshan of Lord Krishna which is extremely crowded always. Its situated near city palace. The temple has an idol of Lord Krishna with Radha.

Name: PoojaSi
Title: Blissfull !!!!!!
Review: Temple is so beautiful with beautiful deities of Shri Radhe Krishna Ji...!!!!!!Attending the Mangla Aarti in the morning is so divine and peace giving that one can get lost in Radhe Krishna for that time.Jai Shri Radhe Krishna !!!!!!

Name: devs224
Title: God
Review: Lord Krisha and Radha both deity are very beautiful. We both feel relax over there. That temple with very quit.

Name: PurPar
Title: Divine
Review: This temple is a must visit. check timings on the website before you plan your visit. Temple invoked a feeling of devotion and love
